name: RocketMouse
description:
This is a game about avoidance. Players will encounter various traps in the game, and all you have to do is to avoid being trapped and move forward!

Game features:

-This game takes up very little memory, and the picture is beautiful.

-The game is simple and easy to use. Players can constantly challenge themselves for higher scores.

-Try to collect more gold coins to get higher scores!

-The mission, the way forward and the design of the game screen are very interesting

-Simple adventure, romantic breakthrough, a unique visual display of the game style

Game highlights:

1. Collect more gold coins on the premise of ensuring your own safety

2. Adjust your position in time to ensure that you can pass the trap smoothly

3. Challenge your escape technology and start a magnificent adventure!
